text:
25 Responses to ‚ÄúHunt for Tom Brady‚Äôs jersey continues‚Äù elmerbrownelmerbrown says: Feb 6, 2017 9:12 PM 
In the end it‚Äôs a shame Toms life will only be remembered for being a great quarterback ! randytheraiderloveboy says: Feb 6, 2017 9:14 PM 
The security in any NFL locker room is tight with wall to wall surveilance cams. Triple that for a SB locker room. Brady is lying again, nobody took it. This is more of his self-attention ‚ÄúI am a victim‚Äù fiction. curtj5 says: Feb 6, 2017 9:16 PM 
Are you Patriots fans going to stop whining about being picked on now, God I hope so! edzo82270 says: Feb 6, 2017 9:17 PM 
Chuck Norris, Walker ‚Äì Texas Ranger is on the case?!? Well consider it solved as Chuck is the only one who remembers the future. deneb1973 says: Feb 6, 2017 9:17 PM 
If the memorabilia crosses state lines or is part of an organized criminal enterprise it can be an issue for the FBI under RICO. Sounds funny but if the jersey is not returned the theft may ultimately implicate the stadium and NFL security giving Brady a cause of action against the NFL. cadreamer1969 says: Feb 6, 2017 9:17 PM

Yeah, I just can‚Äôt shake this feeling that the jersey will turn up inside a frame, mounted on a wall in Brady‚Äôs mancave‚Ä¶ I prefer my Crush to be Orange says: Feb 6, 2017 9:25 PM 
My wife (who was pulling for the Patriots) : no way they come back. 
Me: unlikely, but not impossible 
Since I couldn‚Äôt get any comments posted last night: 
1. Congrats 2. Brady is the best (I loathe those arguments & only engaged in them to troll the Patriots fans, but can‚Äôt honestly call anyone better) 3. Changing my screen name since, well, my team didn‚Äôt win a super bowl this year 4. Glad I‚Äôm not a Falcons fan, yikes! I‚Äôd rather lose like 48 than blow a ‚Äúsure thing‚Äù 5. Hoping the Broncos get decent QB play so someone can actually challenge the Patriots next year 6. Shout out to the 3 patriots fans who actually posted WHILE they were getting stomped. 
Admission: I never really believed that deflategate stuff, just liked trolling the more arrogant among you. Goodell is a punk. 
Finally, to the guy who posted that crap about Brady‚Äôs mom. You suck. You‚Äôre the lowest of the low. But you already knew that.
